sentences.sContent: ...the X85, an all-in-one printer that's also a scanner, fax and copier.
sentences.sCn: ...“X 85”，是集多功能于一体的打印机，同时也是扫描仪、传真机和复印机

sentences.sContent: These funds are an all-in-one approach to investing. They contain a blend of stocks and bonds.
sentences.sCn: 这些基金采用一体化投资方针，既包括股票又包括了债券。

trans.tranOther: All-in-one means having several different parts or several different functions
